name: Reproducibility workshop
tagline: Materials for the Computational Reproducibility workshop
body:
### Cambridge Area Sequencing Informatics: Reproducible Research Workshop
## Friday 27 November 2015, Cancer Research Uk Cambridge Institute

* Julien Bauer
* Andrew Caines
* Peter Clarke

* [Nicole Janz](http://www.nicolejanz.de/)
* [Laurent Gatto](http://lgatto.github.io/rr-what-should-be-our-goals/)
* Natasha Karp
* [Fiona Nielsen](https://www.linkedin.com/in/fionanielsen)
